name: Jack Menace's Adventure
description:
Play as a character named, Jack Menace. 

He is trying to impress someone in his village. Sinbad is always trying to be better than Jack. So Jack needs to prove he is at the same level as Sinbad.

Jack is told by Sinbad to do some things to gain respect. So Jack sets out to complete tasks in order to live up to a good reputation.

This game will probably take about 45minutes of gameplay. It includes some grinding to get your stats up and get better equipment. There is no experience in this game. You get better stats by eating things like berries and slimes. 

This is my first completed game so please give feedback. I really hope you all enjoy this one.
